description: Personnel of the Ministry of Local Government trained in a common Project Management Methodology and strategy for the development of a results Based management system prepared

subproject.corporate outcome: Local Government Reform process increases participation of public in decision making process at the local level
subproject.description:
Expected Outputs:
1. 400 staff of the Ministry trained in PRINCE2
2. Increased awareness of Ministry staff of Results Based Management Systems
3.  Project Initiation Document for RBM 
4. Strengthened Institutional structures, mechanisms and systems within the Ministry
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Capacity Development in Projec
